<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WPGetEntityMappingColumnsSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>WPGetEntityMappingColumnsSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var WPGetEntityMappingColumnsSNC = Class.create();
WPGetEntityMappingColumnsSNC.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    process: function(tableName) {
        var result = [];

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        gr.addQuery('name', tableName);
        gr.addEncodedQuery('elementINe1,e2,e3,e4,e5,e6,e7,e8,e9,e10,e11,e12,e13,e14,e15');
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            result.push(gr.element + '');
        }
        return result;
    },

    type: 'WPGetEntityMappingColumnsSNC'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-07-19 16:05:05</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9341040743c0311037a2b61af9b8f232</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WPGetEntityMappingColumnsSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_scope>

</record_update>
